name: ConnectionParams

fields.name: certificateName
fields.description: The name of the certificate for establishing each connection to the external system.

fields.name: endpoint
fields.description: The URL of the external system.

fields.name: oauthToken
fields.description: The OAuth token that’s issued by the external system.

fields.name: password
fields.description: The password for authenticating to the external system.

fields.name: principalType
fields.description: An instance of DataSource.IdentityType, which determines which set of credentials to use to access the external system.

fields.name: protocol
fields.description: The type of protocol that’s used to authenticate to the external system.

description: Contains the credentials for authenticating to the external
